DOC.detailed_description: The Helsinki Businessmen Study ( HBS ) originally convenient cohort male executive businessmen ( born 1919-1934 , n=3490 ) , participate health check-ups 1964-1973 , since begin 1970s developed clinico-epidemiological longitudinal study . Primary focus prevention cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) , since 2000 focus shift geriatrics , long follow-up ( 50 year ) HBS see `` life-course '' study . Traditional CVD risk factor available 1960s 1974 participant ( available n=3310 ) divide group accord clinical status CVD risk . Two high-risk group ( n=1222 ) low-risk group ( n=593 ) participate 5-year multifactorial primary prevention study 1974-1980 ( in-trial post-trial result publish 1985 1991 ) . The whole original cohort followed-up national register since 1985 regular questionnaire survey since 2000 . Random subcohorts study clinically laboratory genetic examination 2003 2011 . The late questionnaire survey perform winter 2015 two third original cohort die . Follow-up cohort ongoing new research question formulated..
